thread.title: Justin Timberlake's Bai Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Christopher Walken Recites 'Bye, Bye, Bye' (Video)
thread.title_full: Justin Timberlake's Bai Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Christopher Walken Recites 'Bye, Bye, Bye' (Video)

author: Just Jared
title: Justin Timberlake's Bai Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Christopher Walken Recites 'Bye, Bye, Bye' (Video)
text:
Justin Timberlake stars in the new commercial for Bai that aired during the 2017 Super Bowl and he appears alongside Christopher Walken !
“I don’t want to make it tough, I just want to tell you that I’ve had enough, I might sound crazy, but it ain’t no lie, baby, bye, bye, bye,” Walken says while reciting the lyrics to the famous N’Sync song.
COMMERCIALS : See all of the best ads from 2017! 
Watch the full commercial below and make sure to share with your friends because it’s such a good one!

Bai 2017 Big Game Ad – Starring Justin Timberlake & Christopher Walken
